text:
I don't see the problem using the selector from the page settings.
You can use the info populated from that settings in the custom module with the same hubL tags as described in the doc: <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/tutorials/how-to-build-dynamic-pages-with-hubdb>

I think that the field HubDB Tag has a different propose than dynamic pages.

Would be great have the possibility to add different display conditions to a field.
Right now I am working in a hardcore CM with multiple functionalities and would be great do something like:
if:
   field1 == "val1"
  OR
   field1 == "val2"
then:
   display field2
